name: Are You Smarter Than A 5th Grader?: Back To School
name_original: Are You Smarter Than A 5th Grader?: Back To School
description:
Take on thousands of grammar school questions in all new game modes and battle against your friends and family to prove whether you are smarter than a 5th grader!

Features

• Bring the family together to answer over 6,000 questions in 23 categories, including History, Geography, Science and more!
• Use your DSi Camera to import your picture into the game, then choose your favorite smart alec classroom partner to help you win big!
• Battle head-to-head in Super Battle of Wits or challenge up to three other friends in Pop Quiz, Homeroom Mode or Quick Play.
